mapper.select: INSERT INTO magazine(m_Title, m_Content, m_Date, m_Thumb, m_Img, m_Hit, m_Like) VALUES(#{m_Title}, #{m_Content}, CURDATE(), #{m_Thumb}, #{m_Img}, 0, 0);
SELECT m_Seq, m_Title, m_Content, m_Date, m_Thumb, m_Hit, m_Like FROM magazine
SELECT m_Seq, m_Title, m_Content, m_Date, m_Img, m_Hit, m_Like FROM magazine where m_Seq=#{m_Seq}
SELECT m_Title, m_Content, m_Img FROM magazine where m_Seq=#{m_Seq}
